summary: This character base on articocean artwork series. Diiran badweyn is mindi twin brother. He is nice person to accompany your journey in skyrim world.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
"Warriors of the night,
hidden in shadows.
Nothing but knights,
their hearts, just hallows.

Fear makes the land,
seas of blood and rivers of tears.
One man rises his hand,
wind goes through his hairs.

A lonely commander speaks,
the crowd moves.
A crow shrieks.

The non existing end,
is only seen by some.

Because tonight shadows will bend
For the return...
of the Badweyn."


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
His name is Diiran Badweyn.
He is Mindi's twin brother, over 240 years as a Vampire, he wandered across Thamriel to seek information about his past and the existence his twin sister Mindi Badweyn, that he never met since they were born.
-----------------------------------
Add new follower base on my friend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3356175/?]arcticocean[/url] character in game.
Not requrement any mod because this mod is standalone. Diiran is essential and marriageable follower.
feel free to add your picture.
[/center]

[size=+2][b][color=yellow]follower detail :[/color] [/b][/size]
Race : Nord
Name : Diiran Badweyn
Level : 1-80
Default Armor : Iron armor
Default weapon : Steel sword
Location : Castle Dour in Solitude
Magic : Drain health and Raise Zombie
Combat style : Spellsword
Additional Note : He is vampire*.



[size=+2][b][color=yellow]Installation[/color] [/b][/size]
please update your skyrim version to 1.9.32.0.8 before install this mod.
simply use NMM
Manual installation, just copy file to skyrim data folder.

[size=+2][b][color=yellow]Uninstallation [/color] [/b][/size]
first dismiss Diiran as your follower.
simply use NMM
Manual uninstallation, remove all files related to this mod from skyrim data folder


[size=+2][b][color=yellow]Version history [/color] [/b][/size]
1.1
Initial release
Add new follower in game.

[center] [size=+2]Please check more art work from my friend articocean.[/size][/center]

---------------------------------------
* He is not actualy a vampire. Due ugly face morph in vampire race, i decide to set his race in creation kit become RaceNord not RaceNordVampire. So basicly he is human but i add vampire Attribute like poison resistant, frost resistant increase 50%, fire resistant decrease -50%, Disease Resistant, sun damage, and Nightstalker's Footsteps. i also add drain health and raise zombie spell.
** his eyes may be little different between this eyes in version and eyes on some screenshot. most screenshot taken on BETA test and use different eye texture. That texture mod was take down from nexus before this follower mod have change to release. So i make eye texture who almost similiar to previous eye texture.
author: nafis399 and articocean
